text.div:
SHR MissingValueReasonVS CodeSystem

Reasons that a value associated with a test or other observation is missing.

name: SHR MissingValueReasonVS CodeSystem
title: SHR MissingValueReasonVS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other observation is missing.

concept.display: The source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or the question was left unanswered.
concept.definition: The source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or the question was left unanswered.

concept.display: The question or data element is not applicable, or based on other answers, no answer to this question is required.
concept.definition: The question or data element is not applicable, or based on other answers, no answer to this question is required.

concept.display: The reason the information is not present is not known.
concept.definition: The reason the information is not present is not known.

concept.display: The request or order to collect this information was cancelled.
concept.definition: The request or order to collect this information was cancelled.

concept.display: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen
concept.definition: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

concept.display: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
concept.definition: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
